new_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote highlights that cell- and egg-based flu vaccines can develop mutations, implying that Flublok, by contrast, avoids such mutations. This supports the claim that Flublok ensures an identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains by not introducing mutations during production.
